title: Vicky Pattison, 31, is considering freezing her eggs
text:
Vicky Pattison is considering freezing her eggs 'to take the pressure off' as she looks ahead to starting a family.

The reality star, 31, said while she doesn't want to rush into having children while her relationship to boyfriend Ercan Ramadan, 26, is still new, she wants to take 'precautions' to ensure she can have children when the time is right.

The TV personality had a heart-to-heart about her future with her mum Caroll on the upcoming episode of her fly-on-the-wall series Vicky Pattison: No Filter.

Planning for the future: Vicky Pattison, 31, has revealed she is considering freezing her eggs in order to have children when the time is right

Revealing that her biological clock has started ticking, Vicky mused: 'I have never, ever known a fella worry about having kids. But women, God, I don’t know how many women I’ve had that conversation with.

'I am going to want to have kids in the next five to 10 years. I didn’t want kids and I was adamant I didn’t, but I feel like what would my future be without them?'

Vicky told her mum Caroll about her fears, revealing that she’s already thinking of taking the next steps with her plans for the future.

'I don’t want the door to close', the former Geordie Shore star admitted.

He's The One! The star confessed that while she doesn't want to rush into having children while her relationship to boyfriend Ercan Ramadan is still new, she wants to take 'precautions'

'There’s options. So, I can freeze my eggs. I just think it’ll take a little bit of pressure off the way I’m feeling.

'I’d love to have children the traditional way, I’m just taking precautions.'

Elsewhere on the episode, Vicky reflected on her blossoming romance with Ercan, who she has just moved into a flat with in London.

The relationship comes a year on from her split from fiancé John Noble amid allegations he had cheated.

She said: 'There’s options. So, I can freeze my eggs. I just think it’ll take a little bit of pressure off the way I’m feeling'

Moving on: The relationship with Ercan (pictured) comes a year on from her split from fiancé John Noble amid allegations he had cheated

Taking things to the next level, Vicky makes the decision to introduce Ercan to her mum over dinner.

'I think I’m a bit weary this time, I think we’ve got to watch out for Vicky,' Caroll says as they wait for Ercan to arrive.

Feeling protective of her daughter after everything she has been through, Vicky's mum tells the cameras she's going to give him a hard time.

Meeting the family: Taking things to the next level, Vicky makes the decision to introduce Ercan to her mum over dinner

After a short wait, Ercan arrives holding a bouquet of flowers intended for Caroll, making a positive and gentlemanly first impression.

'What a lovely night we’ve had, it’s been really nice. Just seeing him and Vicky together, which was lovely.

'It was just open and honest,' she says, giving Vicky her seal of approval. 'I think that’s what he is, a bit of a genuine lad.'

Vicky Pattison: No Filter airs on Wednesday night at 10pm on Quest Red.
description: Vicky Pattison has revealed she is considering freezing her eggs and wants to take 'precautions' to ensure she can have children when the time is right.
